name: Lithic Spear
description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When played: For each of your party members from Liyue, grant 1 Shield point to the character to which this is attached. (Max 3 points)
(Only Polearm Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
